tha-ap25:7.2: dippati → dippeti (bj) | dibbati (mr), sāsanaṃ → jinasāsanaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap25:12.3: Yaṃ desaṃ → yaṃ yaṃ desaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed), upapajjāmi → upagacchāmi (bj)
tha-ap25:18.3: Hasakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṃ → hāsakhiḍḍāsamaṃgīnaṃ (bj) | sāyaṃ khiḍḍāsamaṅgīhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sahassakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap25:28.1: Sammā dhammaṃ bhāvetvāna → mamopamaṃ karitvāna (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
